name: Area 50-Run
description:
You play Flom Gobly, a gray (green) alien who has crash-landed on earth and is being held captive in Area 51. To keep him occupied, he has been given a collection of classic movies on VHS, but instead of keeping him sedated, they have inspired him to escape and roam the earth, all the while outrunning the pursuing US military and their ominous black aura.

  • use A and D or the arrow keys to run 
  • Space to jump
  • Space twice to double jump
  • Mash Space while running into a wall/ledge to climb it
